techmeme.title: Trump signs an executive action to form a sovereign wealth fund; Commerce secretary nominee Howard Lutnick says it may be used to facilitate a sale of TikTok US (Bloomberg)
In the wake of US tariffs on Canadian goods, the premiere of Ontario Doug Ford says he's "ripping up" the province's $100M Starlink contract (Rochelle Raveendran/CBC News)
The first ever native iPhone porn app, Hot Tub, arrives in the EU via the approved alternative app store AltStore PAL, which was made possible by the DMA (Sarah Perez/TechCrunch)
OpenAI's Deep Research hands-on: very good at nuanced, complex research, and the first narrow agent to do sophisticated and likely economically valuable work (Ethan Mollick/One Useful Thing)
MicroStrategy says it didn't buy any bitcoin in the prior week, ending 12 consecutive weekly purchases worth $20B+ starting in October 2024, and holds ~$44.7B (Monique Mulima/Bloomberg)
